review: Horrible medicine! Has fluoride causing bone problems and vilanterol is poisonous hazard! Why is pharmaceutical companies trying to kill people? I have gained over 60 lbs.  Now I have bone pain. My hips so bad can barely move X-ray showed osteoarthritis just since on this drug. I am so depressed I have never been so sick or fat before. I bruise easily. Tired all the time but unable to sleep. It is miserable. Problems seeing have halo around lights outside lighting really bothers me, night blindness.  Worst part I am a nurse and just tying all these symptoms and this medicine. So many medicine I gave my patients knowing they cause harm and I take medicine that’s horrible for my body. I look in the mirror and don’t even know that person. I used to run track. Very athletic until Drs started giving me medicine.
Works excellent for me in treating COPD. Once per day 200/25 dosage. Albuterol failed to prevent emergency room necessity due to lack of ability to unload air.
Breo has been very effective in treating my Asthma and COPD. I can tell when I've missed it for 1 day.Wish it wasn't so expensive. BCBS stopped covering it .
Going off it after 5 months because I need to see if it's the cause of hypertension and hypertensive crisis.   Never had high bp in my life, ALWAYS on low side.

It somewhat works. It does not last a full 24 hours as they claim. Last about 14 hours. I'm going to stop using it because of the price. Way too costly.  They also change the price constantly. Can't wait until all these companies patents run out on long term inhalers so I can get a generic version.

I am a 57 woman with very early COPD due to smoking for 30 years.  I have been on Breo for 3 months and it has worked great for me!  No shortness of breath while walking like before. I have had leg pain but could be from the statin I'm taking.  I would say the benefits I've received from this drug far out weigh the slight side effects I've experienced.

I have chronic asthmaI have been on Breo  for 3 months. I am able to breathe . Not used any ventolin at all. At first I had dizzy spells a couple of times which lasted for a few hours. I was full of energy and so happy that I am able to do my house chores without any issues. After a while  I noticed my scalp itchy and dry.My muscles started to ache, my joints specially. I started to gain weight, hungry all the time. I was becoming tired unable to concentrate. My face bloated, I was retaining fluid, which I noticed when I took off my socks. Had to buy  some new shoes and to my amazement I had to buy a size bigger. What do you do , put up with side effects to breathe ?

Doctor gave me a sample. Used it 3 days. I do think it helped my breathing but I stopped using it. I had the worst headache ever. And terrible mouth pain. All of my teeth hurt and the entire inside of my mouth. Those problems were so painful that I stopped using it.

Breo definitely helped with breathing but the side effects are not good for me. On Breo for 3 months and found I gained 20 pounds, was always hungry, excessive phlegm, continually tired, leg cramps in the morning, extreme uncomfortable bloating to the point I thought I would bust.  So no....it doesn’t work for me.

My pulmonologist prescribed Breo Ellipta for a lung infection so despite the chain of side-affects I did the one month course. It did alleviate the issues I was having along with a course of other steroids but going forward, No Thank You.  I use my nebulizer something else which I should have reverted to in the first place and it works much better

I had intense wheezing originating from my throat that prevented me from falling asleep.  After using other medications did not resolve the issue, Breo did.  When the wheezing returns I use Breo once or twice (one per day) to eliminate the wheezing.
Breo along with Incruse has improved by breathing ten fold!  I am so happy to be feeling better .  Free Co-Pay from both companies
Intense itching on front and back of torso and arms.

my doctor change albuterol to breo ellipta 200/25 i used 6 months. It help but it design  for that, i have lot side defect, blood pressure  go up  from 145/155 to 165 then gain weight from 180 pounds  to 190 pounds  + start getting  boils left and right usually  between  4 to 6 weeks  on my face 6 times and on my but 4 times  .I do not recomended  this medication  is very expensive  then i stop used 2 weeks and i will  like proof my doctor those boils is becouse i used thic medicine  ,according to my doctor it's not from breo ellipta
Tried this for a month and it didn't work nearly as well as my previous medications.  Asked doctor to switch me back.  Awkward inhaler.
Has made a big improvement in my breathing . Just be sure to rinse your mouth well after using to avoid throat and mouth issues.
